name: app.R
content: library(shiny) options(shiny.maxRequestSize = 100 * 1024^2) # define stuff maxiter <- 250 fbl1 <- function(t) -2 - 0.5*log(t) fbl2 <- function(t) -3 - 0.5*log(t) fbl3 <- function(t) -4 - 0.5*log(t) fx1 <- function(x1) 0.5*x1 fx2 <- function(x2) 1.5*sin(x2) fx3 <- function(x3) x3^2/6 - 1.5 fx4 <- function(x4) sin(2*(4*x4-2))+2*exp(-(16^2)*(x4-0.5)^2) trans2sd <- function(x, sd = 1) (sd*x)/sd(unique(x)) demean <- function(x) x - mean(x) coleffects <- c(hcl.colors(8, "YlGnBu")[2], hcl.colors(8, "YlOrRd")[2]) names(coleffects) <- c('true', 'esti') shinymods <- c('glm' = 'GLM', 'bam' = 'BAM', 'bbfit' = 'BBFIT') shinyvars <- c('t' = 'Baseline', 'x1' = 'Linear', 'x2' = 'Sinus', 'x3' = 'Squared', 'x4' = 'Complex', setNames(paste('Noise', 1:6), paste0('n', 1:6))) # ui ui <- fluidPage( titlePanel( div(HTML("Appendix of Simultaneous estimation and model choice for big discrete time-to-event data with additive predictors")) ), sidebarLayout( sidebarPanel( ## file upload and start button fluidRow( column(8, fileInput("rdsfile", "Upload RDS-File")), column(4, div(style = "margin-top: 25px;", actionButton("startplot", "Plot"))) ), ## model selection selectInput("model", "Model:", choices = setNames(names(shinymods), shinymods), selected = 'bbfit'), ## variable selection selectInput("variable", "Variable:", choices = setNames(names(shinyvars), shinyvars), selected = 't'), ## replications numericInput("rep", "Replication:", value = 1, min = 1, max = 250, step = 1), ## plot specs selectInput("plottype", "Plotting option:", choices = c("Overlay", "Separate"), selected = "Overlay"), conditionalPanel( condition = "input.plottype == 'Overlay'", checkboxInput("plotmean", "Plot mean", value = TRUE), checkboxInput("plotquants", "Plot quantiles", value = TRUE), ), checkboxInput("plottrue", "Plot true/zero line", value = TRUE), checkboxInput("customy", "Custom Y-axis limits", value = TRUE), conditionalPanel( condition = "input.customy == true", numericInput("ymin", "Y-axis min:", value = -2, step = 0.2), numericInput("ymax", "Y-axis max:", value = 2, step = 0.2) ) ), mainPanel( plotOutput("plotout", height = "760px") ) ) ) # server server <- function(input, output, session) { ## rvs rv <- reactiveValues(stop = TRUE, data = NULL) ## data getdata <- reactive({ req(input$rdsfile) }) observeEvent(input$rdsfile, { rv$data <- readRDS(input$rdsfile$datapath) }) ## plot effect output$plotout <- renderPlot({ if(rv$stop) { ## if settings change, press button to start plotting par(mfrow = c(1, 1), mar = c(0, 0, 0, 0)) plot.new() text(0.5, 0.5, 'Press "Plot" to start plotting.', cex = 1.5) } else if(!input$model %in% c('glm', 'bam', 'bbfit') | !input$variable %in% c('t', 'x1', 'x2', 'x3', 'x4', paste0('n', 1:6)) | input$rep < 1 | input$rep > maxiter) { ## if file not found plot text that says that file not found ## or setting is not available par(mfrow = c(1, 1), mar = c(0, 0, 0, 0)) plot.new() text(0.5, 0.5, 'Setting not availiable!', cex = 1.5) } else { ## testing # dat <- readRDS(file = 'bb4sa-shinylive_data/sim_ind_5000_bali_-3_sd_1_spaeff_FALSE.rds') # input <- list(model = 'bbfit', # variable = 't', # rep = 100, # plottype = 'Overlay', # plotmean = TRUE, # plotquants = TRUE, # plottrue = TRUE, # customy = TRUE, # ymin = -2, ymax = 2) ## read dat <- rv$data ## current setting ind <- dat[[1]]$setting$ind bali <- dat[[1]]$setting$bali setsd <- dat[[1]]$setting$sd spaeff <- dat[[1]]$setting$spaeff ## check if file exists and if true plot if(!is.null(dat[[1]])) { ## subset current file fi <- paste0('sim_ind_', ind, '_bali_', bali, '_sd_', setsd, '_spaeff_', spaeff, '_mod_', input$model, '_rep_', sprintf("%03d", input$rep)) y <- dat[[fi]]$pred.eff[[input$variable]] if(length(y) == 1) y <- rep(y[1], 100) ## matching x x <- if (input$variable == 't') { seq(1, 20, length.out = 100) } else if (input$variable == 'x4') { seq(0, 1, length.out = 100) } else { seq(-3, 3, length.out = 100) } ## true effect if(input$variable == 't' & bali == -2) yt <- demean(fbl1(x)) if(input$variable == 't' & bali == -3) yt <- demean(fbl2(x)) if(input$variable == 't' & bali == -4) yt <- demean(fbl3(x)) if(input$variable == 'x1') yt <- demean(trans2sd(fx1(x), setsd)) if(input$variable == 'x2') yt <- demean(trans2sd(fx2(x), setsd)) if(input$variable == 'x3') yt <- demean(trans2sd(fx3(x), setsd)) if(input$variable == 'x4') yt <- demean(trans2sd(fx4(x), setsd)) if(input$variable %in% paste0('n', 1:6)) yt <- rep(0, 100) ## bias yb <- y - yt ## custom y limits ylimits <- if(input$customy) { c(input$ymin, input$ymax) } else {c(min(y, yb, yt), max(y, yb, yt))} ## define info for legend le <- list() le$le <- c(paste0("Estimated (Rep.: ", input$rep, ")"), paste0("Estimated (Rep.: ", ifelse(input$rep == 1, "-", paste0('1-',input$rep-1)), ")"), "Mean of estimated", "Q2.5/97.5 of estimated", "True/Zero line") le$lt <- c(1, 1, 1, 2, 1) le$co <- c('black', 'lightgrey', coleffects[['esti']], coleffects[['esti']], coleffects[['true']]) ## plot par par(mfrow = c(2, 1), mar = c(2.1, 2.1, 2.1, 1.1), oma = c(0, 0, 0, 11)) ## init lists for prev reps eff <- list(); eff[[1]] <- y bias <- list(); bias[[1]] <- yb ## plot estimated effects separate or as overlay if (input$plottype == 'Separate') { plot(x, y, type = "l", ylim = ylimits, xlab = NA, ylab = NA) le$i <- 1 } else if(input$plottype == 'Overlay') { if(input$rep == 1) { plot(x, y, type = "l", ylim = ylimits, xlab = NA, ylab = NA) } else { plot(x, eff[[1]], type = "n", ylim = ylimits, xlab = NA, ylab = NA, col = 'lightgrey') for(r in 2:(input$rep-1)) { fi <- paste0('sim_ind_', ind, '_bali_', bali, '_sd_', setsd, '_spaeff_', spaeff, '_mod_', input$model, '_rep_', sprintf("%03d", r)) eff[[r]] <- dat[[fi]]$pred.eff[[input$variable]] if(length(eff[[r]]) == 1) eff[[r]] <- rep(eff[[r]][1], 100) lines(x, eff[[r]], col = 'lightgrey') } lines(x, y) } le$i <- 1:2 ## plot mean of reps 1-current rep if(input$plotmean) { lines(x, apply(do.call(cbind, eff), 1, mean), col = coleffects[['esti']], lty = 1, lwd = 2) le$i <- 1:3 } if(input$plotquants) { lines(x, apply(do.call(cbind, eff), 1, FUN = function(x) quantile(x, probs = 0.025)), col = coleffects[['esti']], lty = 2, lwd = 2) lines(x, apply(do.call(cbind, eff), 1, FUN = function(x) quantile(x, probs = 0.975)), col = coleffects[['esti']], lty = 2, lwd = 2) le$i <- 1:4 } } ## plot true effect if(input$plottrue) { lines(x, yt, col = coleffects[['true']], lty = 1, lwd = 2) le$i <- c(le$i, 5) } ## plot adjusted legend legend(par('usr')[2], par('usr')[4], bty = 'n', xpd = NA, legend = c( paste0('Model = ', shinymods[input$model]), paste0('Variable = ', shinyvars[input$variable]), '', paste0('Individuals = ', ind), paste0('Baseline = ', bali), paste0('SD = ', setsd), paste0('Spatial effect = ', spaeff), '', le$le[le$i] ), lty = c(rep(NA, 8), le$lt[le$i]), col = c(rep(NA, 8), le$co[le$i]), y.intersp = 1.2) ## plot heading mtext("Effect", side = 3, line = 0.5, adj = 0, cex = 1.2) ## plot estimated bias separate or as overlay if (input$plottype == 'Separate') { plot(x, yb, type = "l", ylim = ylimits, xlab = NA, ylab = NA) } else if(input$plottype == 'Overlay') { if(input$rep == 1) { plot(x, yb, type = "l", ylim = ylimits, xlab = NA, ylab = NA) } else { plot(x, bias[[1]], type = "n", ylim = ylimits, xlab = NA, ylab = NA, col = 'lightgrey') for(r in 2:(input$rep-1)) { bias[[r]] <- eff[[r]] - yt lines(x, bias[[r]], col = 'lightgrey') } lines(x, yb) } ## plot mean of reps 1-current rep if(input$plotmean) { lines(x, apply(do.call(cbind, bias), 1, mean), col = coleffects[['esti']], lty = 1, lwd = 2) } if(input$plotquants) { lines(x, apply(do.call(cbind, bias), 1, FUN = function(x) quantile(x, probs = 0.025)), col = coleffects[['esti']], lty = 2, lwd = 2) lines(x, apply(do.call(cbind, bias), 1, FUN = function(x) quantile(x, probs = 0.975)), col = coleffects[['esti']], lty = 2, lwd = 2) } } ## plot true effect if(input$plottrue) { lines(x, rep(0, 100), col = coleffects[['true']], lty = 1, lwd = 2) } ## plot heading mtext("Bias", side = 3, line = 0.5, adj = 0, cex = 1.2) } } }) ## reset and stop plotting on any input change observeEvent(list(input$rdsfile # , # input$model, input$variable, # input$rep, # input$plottype ), { rv$stop <- TRUE }, ignoreInit = TRUE) ## start plotting if plot button is pressed observeEvent(input$startplot, { rv$stop <- FALSE }, ignoreInit = TRUE) } shinyApp(ui, server)
